Immerse yourself again in the spectacular and unforgettable world of Rapture with BioShock 2, the second game of the franchise that has won over 50 awards for Best Game of the Year. BioShock 2 provides players an explosive mixture of combat first person shooter with a strong narrative to create one of the most anticipated titles of 2009.
Experience the power and brute force of the people more fearful of Rapture while you play the most iconic and significant character of BioShock: Big Daddy.
In addition to a rich and deep campaign mode also adds multiplayer mode BioShock 2, which will provide a great gaming experience that expands the story of the origins of fiction of BioShock. Located in the decline of Rapture, players take the role of a character chosen to test the new plasmids by Sinclair Solutions, a leading provider of plasmids and tonics for the sunken city of Rapture.
